attributes.action: Make the unemployed work for dole money.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister should make able bodied people who are on the dole work for their money, almost like having a job.
The 'jobs' should benefit the local community EG helping local councils to clean up city centres.
Why should they get handouts?
All benefits should be stopped if work is not performed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
